013package org.apache.juneau.svl;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.ArgUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.StringUtils.*;
017
018import java.util.*;
019
020/**
021 * A subclass of {@link DefaultingVar} that simply pulls values from a {@link Map}.
022 *
023 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
024 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../index.html#jm.SimpleVariableLanguage">Simple Variable Language</a>
025
026 * </ul>
027 */
028@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
029public abstract class MapVar extends DefaultingVar {
030
031   private final Map m;
032
033   /**
034    * Constructor.
035    *
036    * @param name The name of this variable.
037    * @param m The map to pull values from.
038    */
039   public MapVar(String name, Map m) {
040      super(name);
041      assertArgNotNull("m", m);
042      this.m = m;
043   }
044
045   @Override /* Var */
046   public String resolve(VarResolverSession session, String varVal) {
047      return stringify(m.get(varVal));
048   }
049}
